title: FEAST 2023: Bergen, Norway
text: Formal and Experimental Advances in Sign Language Theory (FEAST 2023) will take place at the University of Bergen, Norway, on June 27th–29th, 2023.

title: About
text:
FEAST (Formal and Experimental Advances in Sign Language Theory) is the regular forum to discuss formal approaches to sign language grammar (in particular in the generative tradition), experimental approaches to sign languages, and their interaction. FEAST is held as a conference series once every two years since 2015. The next installment will take place at the University of Bergen, Norway, on June 27th–29th, 2023. It is organized by the Department for Linguistic, Literary and Aesthetic Studies at the University of Bergen (UiB), and co-organized by the Western Norway University of Applied Sciences (HVL) and The Centre for Sign Linguistics and Deaf Studies of Chinese University of Hong Kong.
Information about previous FEAST conferences can be find here: https://sites.google.com/site/feastconference/home.

title: Call for papers (CfP)
text:
Formal and Experimental Advances in Sign Language Theory (FEAST) 2023
The tenth meeting of the “Formal and Experimental Advances in Sign Language Theory” (FEAST) colloquium will take place at the University of Bergen, Norway, on June 27th–29th, 2023. It is organized by the Department for Linguistic, Literary and Aesthetic Studies at the University of Bergen (UiB), and co-organized by the Western Norway University of Applied Sciences (HVL) and The Centre for Sign Linguistics and Deaf Studies of Chinese University of Hong Kong.

text:
